author: palladia
body: Pulling in Psl-monad #43, and Psl-native #4. This also has updated pester tests for New-Item cmdlet. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/749)

title: New Linux GetTarget and GetLinkType for symbolic and hard links, also fixes GetChildItem for symbolic links
